Package it.polimi.ingsw.Messages

Class MessageUtilities

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Messages.MessageUtilities
public class MessageUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains utilities methods useful to parsing the messages It is a Singleton

    • getType

      public Message.MessageType getType​(java.lang.String message) throws MalformedMessageException
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be parsed
      Returns:
      MessageType which represents the enum type of the message
      Throws:
      MalformedMessageException - if the message is not correctly formed
